name: Read errors
description: A text containing the errors of the web console

headingType.description: The heading level of the widget; h1-h3. Default is h1.

widgetText.description: The text to be displayed in the widget

setH1.description: Update the hX tag of the KPI field to h1

setH2.description: Update the hX tag of the KPI field to h2

setH3.description: Update the hX tag of the KPI field to h3

getH.description: Get the hX tag of the KPI field

setText.description: Set the text value of the widget

parameters.name: newTextValue
parameters.description: The displayed angle of the gauge

onClick.description: Called when the user clicks the Gauge
